context/1: so they know, as long as I´m alive, that this house will attend all honor calls.
context/2: Lock them up...or better yet... let them come down, that way they´ll see that there are brave men.
context/3: Don´t you ever think about them?

response: I'd better get you something to cover up that uniform till you get where you're going.
context/2: Till you get what you were after.
context/3: Yeah.
context/4: You're still aiming to hold me?
context/7: Don't go to sleep cos they'll be back.

context: My brother told me to look after her

context/1: I'm pointing it at a no-good Yankee.

context: This is Bayonne, New Jersey calling Langham Field.

context/2: We're diving on the first one.

response: Can you get in touch with her?

response: Well, if you're so sure, why not give us the benefit of this idea?
context/0: It's been staring us in the face.
context/1: Made me feel as though we've been blind.
context/2: Came to me all of a sudden, just a little while ago.
